dcterms:description: A test set containing 1K synthesized utterances in French for evaluating the recognition of navigation queries, specifically designed to assess the performance of the model on foreign place names.
dcterms:title: Directions test set

dcterms:creator: C. Kim
A. Misra
K. Chin
T. Hughes
A. Narayanan
T. Sainath
M. Bacchiani
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 35 million English utterances sampled from general Google traffic, anonymized and hand-transcribed for training deep neural networks for speech recognition.
dcterms:title: Training set (35 million English utterances)

dcterms:description: A test set containing English utterances sampled from general Google traffic, used to evaluate the model's performance without any biasing.
dcterms:title: No-biasing test set
